name: FavoritePerson
0:
”Alexa open favorite person”
”Alexa ask favorite person who is your favorite today”
”Alexa ask favorite person to add Cinderella as favorite”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: favorite person
des: This simple fun skill picks a favorite person of the day. It can pick from its own favorites (like Santa) or from your suggestions. A suggestion can also include why someone should be a favorite. To get started, enable the skill and say 'open Favorite Person'
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
